name: The Eagle Has Landed
description:
An experience in the space, where you can live the adventure of astronauts who move the first steps on the moon.

SYNOPSIS

Virtual reality application concerning lunar explorations, which allows the user to live the experiences of astronauts, from the first step on the Moon to all the experiments performed.

GOAL

Infotainment: the user can feel like an astronaut for a day interacting with the environment and at the same time learn many historical and scientific curiosities that will be described in the course of the experience.

HOW TO PLAY

The user personally plays the role of an astronaut who is about to tread the moon. First of all, he will be able to explore the 3D environment and become familiar with typical movements (low acceleration of gravity and spacesuit). Later, depending on the area visited, the user will be offered to try mini-experiences based on historical facts, real and future experiments. For each completed experience, the user will be assigned a badge that will allow them to unlock a new one. To accompany these experiences there will be brief descriptions of the activities carried out and various curiosities.

COMMANDS Player Movement:

W - A - S - D

Camera Movement:

Mouse

Interact with objects:

E

Throw objects:

Right mouse

Jump:

SPACE
